quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Confidence is preparation. Everything else is beyond your control.
author: Richard Kline

quote: With confidence, you have won before you have started.
author: Marcus Garvey

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
author: Peter T. Mcintyre

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: The most beautiful thing you can wear is confidence.
author: Blake Lively

quote: Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Your only limit is you.
author: Anonymous

quote: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Confidence is silent. Insecurities are loud.
author: Unknown

quote: The way to develop self-confidence is to do the thing you fear and get a record of successful experiences behind you.
author: William Jennings Bryan

quote: Confidence is not ‘they will like me.’ Confidence is ‘I’ll be fine if they don’t.’
author: Christina Grimmie

quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Confidence comes from discipline and training.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Courage doesn’t always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, ‘I will try again tomorrow.’
author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quote: Confidence is not thinking you are better than anyone else, it’s realizing you have no reason to compare yourself to anyone else.
author: Unknown

quote: Act as if it were impossible to fail.
author: Dorothy Broude

quote: Confidence is key. Sometimes you need to look like you’re confident even when you’re not.
author: Vanessa Hudgens

quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Confidence is the ability to feel beautiful, without needing someone to tell you.
author: Mandy Hale

quote: Don’t wait until everything is just right. It will never be perfect. There will always be challenges.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Confidence is not about being extroverted, it’s about being comfortable with who you are.
author: Unknown

quote: If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint,' then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down.
author: Chantal Sutherland

quote: Confidence is preparation. Everything else is beyond your control.
author: Richard Kline

quote: With realization of one’s own potential and self-confidence in one’s ability, one can build a better world.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
author: Benjamin Spock

quote: Confidence is not arrogance. Confidence is knowing who you are and not apologizing for it.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: Confidence is when you believe in yourself and your abilities, no matter the situation.
author: Anonymous

quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: Confidence is the willingness to appear foolish.
author: Jane Fonda

quote: Confidence is the memory of success.
author: David Storey

quote: The more you believe in yourself, the more others will believe in you.
author: Unknown

quote: Be bold, be brave, be you.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is not 'I will succeed.' Confidence is 'I will try.'
author: Unknown

quote: Self-confidence is the first requisite to great undertakings.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Confidence is contagious. So is lack of confidence.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Do not let anyone else's opinion of you become your reality.
author: Les Brown

quote: Confidence is a habit that can be developed by acting as if you already had it.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Confidence is not about being perfect. It’s about being real.
author: Unknown

quote: Have confidence that there is always something to be learned from every challenge.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is not about knowing everything; it's about being willing to learn.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is when you know your worth and don’t settle for less.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence begins the moment you stop seeking validation from others.
author: Unknown

quote: Fear fades when you decide your growth matters more than your comfort.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence grows when you keep promises to yourself.
author: Unknown

quote: Every small win you acknowledge strengthens your self-confidence.
author: Unknown

quote: You are capable of far more than your doubts allow you to believe.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is choosing action even when certainty is absent.
author: Unknown

quote: A calm mind is one of the strongest signs of true confidence.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is built when you accept your flaws without letting them define you.
author: Unknown

quote: When you trust yourself, hesitation loses its power.
author: Unknown

quote: Stepping forward despite fear is the purest form of confidence.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is clarity about who you are and peace with who you’re becoming.
author: Unknown

quote: You gain confidence not by avoiding challenges but by surviving them.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence starts when you stop explaining yourself to everyone.
author: Unknown

quote: Bravery fuels confidence, even when your voice shakes.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is knowing you can adapt, no matter what happens.
author: Unknown

quote: Growth and confidence rise together when you embrace discomfort.
author: Unknown

quote: Your belief in yourself teaches others how to treat you.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is choosing to stand tall even after you fall.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence thrives when comparison disappears.
author: Unknown

quote: Each challenge you face successfully becomes evidence of your strength.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is built through action, not waiting for motivation.
author: Unknown

quote: Even slow steps forward require courage and confidence.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence means trusting your decisions even when outcomes are uncertain.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence grows when you stop replaying past mistakes.
author: Unknown

quote: You don’t need permission to believe in yourself.
author: Unknown

quote: Facing uncertainty with resolve is a powerful form of confidence.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is knowing your worth without proving it.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence increases when you stop fearing failure as a final outcome.
author: Unknown

quote: Believing in yourself is an act of self-respect.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence grows every time you choose persistence over fear.
author: Unknown

quote: True confidence doesn’t shout; it remains steady.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is strengthened when you recognize how far you’ve come.
author: Unknown

quote: You become confident when you stop doubting your ability to learn.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is daring to move forward without guarantees.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence grows when self-trust replaces self-criticism.
author: Unknown

quote: Every effort you make adds to your confidence, even unseen ones.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is believing you are enough, even while improving.
author: Unknown

quote: Choosing resilience in tough moments builds lasting confidence.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence comes from clarity, not perfection.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence increases when you stop shrinking to fit expectations.
author: Unknown

quote: Trusting yourself is the foundation of confidence.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is showing up even when you feel unready.
author: Unknown

quote: A confident mind focuses on solutions, not limitations.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is built when effort becomes a habit.
author: Unknown

quote: You gain confidence when you stop questioning your right to exist boldly.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence means standing firm even when opinions shift.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence is believing you can handle whatever comes next.
author: Unknown

quote: Confidence grows when you stop waiting for the perfect moment.
author: Unknown
